short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LGTM prints review statuses as stamp labels on the GitHub pull request overview page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LGTM extension prints review statuses as stamp labels on the GitHub pull request overview page. It does not replace any functionality provided by GitHub, but makes review statuses more visible.
